title: Unexpected
description: For two thousand years the Domus served as a guiding light to the Viator, a people born with the ability to travel through time. Now, faced with a threat to their very existence, Derian is tasked with protecting a woman whose abilities may be the one thing that could save them. Hailey MacIntyre is thrust into an adventure through time and discovery. No one prepared her for the dramatic changes that crashed into her life one fateful afternoon at the wrong end of a car-jacker’s gun. Now she’s running for her life with new talents she never knew were possible. Will she find herself the unwitting accomplice to the destruction of the Domus or the savior to a people she didn’t know existed?
author: Erin Lausten
